boardgame.name: Project: ELITE
boardgame.description: In a post apocalyptic setting, an alien civilization has invaded Earth. Players work together as part of a special ops team with the code name _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;ELITE_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. They are dispatched to high priority missions - protecting objectives and defending vital targets against the alien invaders._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Project: ELITE is a co-operative, real-time, speed-dice, tactical, tower-defense-like game in which players roll dice with symbols as fast as they can allowing them to do various actions with their character on the game board. They move around shooting and cutting through waves of aliens blocking their advance while at the same time trying to complete objectives that will bring them to victory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game consists of a number of real-time 2-minute rounds (depending on the scenario) separated by an AI Alien Phase where aliens perform abilities, advance towards their goal and receive reinforcements._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The constant performance of actions through dice rolling combined with an innovative combat/movement system result in a mix of intense gameplay that offers countless hours of fun._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;What really makes Project: ELITE unique is the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Alien Move_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; symbol that appears on one side of each of the player's dice and forces him/her to move an alien towards their goal._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The end result is a real-time tactical board game where friend and foe are in constant motion, trying to prevail over the other._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Kickstarter version with tons of stretch rewards. Includes: Full base game Stretch goals that don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t come included retail: Carister Mega Boss 4 Advanced runners 4 advanced shooters 4 advanced biters Breedar boss New Event card and 2 runners Backer named boss New weapon and 2 biters 6 slugs new item and 2 shooters 3 creeping Recovery/Recon 3D tokens Demolition 3D tokens Calarook Boss 5 event cards Ephialtes boss Sandman character 6 myriads 2 advanced guardians 2 advanced eruptors extermination 3D tokens Rahdox boss A crazy number of extras included and everything will be sent to you unopened. This should be delivered soon and I will ship immediately. I have sold kickstarters early in the past and never had a problem. Shipping to CONUS is $15.
Box has been opened, but all game components are mint. Buyers located in Germany should pay via Überweisung, international buyers can pay via Paypal. Postage in Germany is 6,99 Euro.

Shrinkwrapped and in stock Language: English Within The Netherlands € 4,- per shipment to a Kiala service point near you or € 6,75 per shipment for delivery at your doorstep. Shipment to Belgium by Kiala is € 7,50. Payment is possible by bank transfer or Paypal (costs +3%)

Game: Project: ELITE (Artipia) Kickstarter version with stretchgoals Condition: new in shrinkwrap Language: English comes in two separate boxes plus replacement figurines Adrenaline expansion also available Megaboss arriving soon Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Paypal (add 6,- Euro to cover the fees. That should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Returns and Cancellation: You may cancel your order without giving any reasons within 14 days after placing your order. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. Spieleberatung Frank Solnitzky Hainbuchenweg 1 36381 Schlüchtern Germany +49-06661-9115039 spieleberatung@t-online.de

I have this in hand and it is ready to ship. I backed on Kickstarter so this includes the base game, Kickstarter extras, and some add-ons. Specifically, here is what is included: Project: ELITE base game Project: ELITE - Alien Pack (Kickstarter Extras in their own box) Project: ELITE - Sandman Project: ELITE - Rahdox Project: ELITE - Mega Boss Bundle (two extra bosses, each in its own box) Two extra sets of Custom Dice, which allow the game to be played by up to six players I have opened each of these but everything is unpunched and in like-new condition. The game is unplayed and all the plastic components are still in their original bags. I was really excited about the game when I backed it but have since played some real-time games with my family and they did not like them at all. You can check out the Kickstarter campaign here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/241478362/project-elite/description. I backed at the $85 level and then added additional items. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a big box, so shipping will be $20. I can usually ship the day after receiving payment. The game will be coming from Georgia (30720). Please let me know if you have any questions.

In hand and it is ready to ship. It was backed on Kickstarter so this includes the base game, Kickstarter extras, and some add-ons. Specifically, here is what is included: Project: ELITE base game Project: ELITE - Alien Pack (Kickstarter Extras in their own box) Project: ELITE - Sandman Project: ELITE - Rahdox Project: ELITE - Mega Boss Bundle (two extra bosses, each in its own box) This was recent rated as Tom Vasel_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s 3rd favorite game of 2016! Each of these was opened but everything is unpunched and in like-new condition. The game is unplayed and all the plastic components are still in their original bags.

The basegame is sold together with the following items: Project: ELITE - Adrenaline Project: ELITE - Alien Pack Project: ELITE - Rahdox Project: ELITE - Sandman The game was just played a few times but is still in mint condition. The cards are sleeved. My household is smoke free. Payment via PayPal or direct bank transfer. For foreign shipping please contact me before buying.

Brand new copy of Project: ELITE. Unopened and still in shrink. Includes full Kickstarter edition of game + separate box for all stretch goals. I pledged $85 for my copy. Shipping via USPS Priority Flat Rate for $15 (total = $85 + $15 = $100).

Up for purchase is the Kickstarter edition of Project: ELITE with the Kickstarter rewards (contained in the Alien Pack). The boxes themselves are still wrapped and unopened, and there is no damage. Will also take best offers. Send me your zip code so I can accurately charge shipping. Please let me know if you have any questions and I will do my best to answer them. Thanks for looking!

Complete Project: ELITE kickstarter pledge with all stretch goals. Will ship UPS Ground. In a post apocalyptic scenery, an alien civilization has invaded Earth. Players work together as part of a special ops team with the code name _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;ELITE_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. They are dispatched to high priority missions protecting objectives and defending vital targets against the alien invaders. Project: ELITE is a co-operative, real-time, speed-dice, tactical, tower-defense-like game in which players roll dice with symbols as fast as they can allowing them to do various actions with their character on the game board. They move around shooting and cutting through waves of aliens blocking their advance while at the same time they try to complete objectives that will bring them to victory. The game consists of a number of real-time 2-minute Rounds (depending on the scenario) separated by an AI Alien phase where aliens perform abilities, advance towards their goal and receive reinforcements. The constant performance of actions through dice rolling combined with an innovative combat/movement system result in a mix of intense gameplay that offers countless hours of fun. What really makes Project: ELITE unique is the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Alien Move_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; symbol that appears on one side of each of the player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s dice and forces him/her to move an alien towards their goal. The end-result is a real-time tactical board game where friend and foe are on an constant motion trying to prevail.

They move around shooting and cutting through waves of aliens blocking their advance while at the same time they try to complete objectives that will bring them to victory. The game consists of a number of real-time 2-minute Rounds (depending on the scenario) separated by an AI Alien phase where aliens perform abilities, advance towards their goal and receive reinforcements. The constant performance of actions through dice rolling combined with an innovative combat/movement system result in a mix of intense gameplay that offers countless hours of fun. What really makes Project: ELITE unique is the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Alien Move_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; symbol that appears on one side of each of the player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s dice and forces him/her to move an alien towards their goal. The end-result is a real-time tactical board game where friend and foe are on an constant motion trying to prevail.

This includes: The Base Game (played once) The two Alien Mega boss add-ons (boxes opened) The Kickstarter extras Two extra Dice sets The Adrenaline Expansion (in shrink wrap) Shipping included for shipping to the U.S.

missing 1 mini ( pendragon) - manufacturer mistake. Using a substitute works just great. With all the aliens being shot and spawning all around you, it will not be an issue. Tons of fun. This is one game I may regret selling. Below is a copy of the inventory as found here on BGG. Project Elite Main box (cards marked PR: E) 16 action dice 16 hit dice 1 d20 randomizer die 1 “d3” randomizer die (actually a d6 with 1,2,3 repeated twice) 1 plastic orange timer 1 rulebook 1 doublesided game board Large cards (note that the total card count is NOT 196 as box says, rather it’s 155) 6 character cards 24 setup cards (8 each of easy medium hard) standard cards 8 boss alien cards 30 alien soldier cards 6 alien special cards 4 player aid cards 16 alien tech cards 23 event cards 19 item cards 23 weapon cards Minis 6 tan character minis 20 grey alien soldier biter minis 20 grey alien soldier runner minis 20 grey alien soldier shooter minis 1 green alien special hound mini 1 green alien special time bendermini 1 green alien special time walker mini 1 green alien special strider mini 1 green alien special slime spitter mini 1 green alien special spawning egg mini 1 red alien boss Pendra’a’gon mini (missing from my copy, but using a substitute works just great) 1 red alien boss Plague bringer mini 1 red alien boss Phobos mini 1 red alien boss Ductar mini 1 red alien boss Crushox mini 1 red alien boss Roachoc mini 1 red alien boss Acidox mini 1 red alien boss Thrustar mini Tokens (round unless otherwise specified) 1 round marker token 5 alien tech tokens 8 objective tokens 36 one life tokens 6 five life tokens 2 ‘spawn’ing tokens 5 prevent alien move tokens 3 spawning area tokens 12 acid tokens 4 slime tokens 6 double sided ‘E’vent tokens 1 single sided ‘E’vent token (not listed in rules components list) 7 ‘B’oss tokens 8 square recovery/recon tiles 8 square demolition tiles 8 square extermination tiles
Shipping costs: Germany: 5,99 Euro EU: 15,99 Euro USA: 33,15 Euro Worldwide: please ask for exact shipping costs to your country

Opened, inventoried the minis and such, but cards still in shrink, unpunched, and unplayed. This package includes Project: ELITE (the base set), the Alien Pack, as well as all of the Kickstarter rewards (though it does not include the extra mega boss add-ons). The components are complete, except instead of 22 shooter minis, the package includes 23 shooter minis, and instead of 22 runner minis, the package includes 21 runner minis. The base game came with 20 runners and shooters, the extra few were Kickstarter rewards. I also have the expansion to this game for sale under the Project ELITE: Adrenaline page on Geek Market. I will give discounted shipping if both are purchased by the same person. The item is shipping from PA 19520. The dimensions of the two game boxes are just under 13_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 13_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 7_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, and just under 8 lbs. 4 day shipping to Los Angeles via FedEx Ground would cost $16.71 5 day shipping to New York City via USPS ParcelSelect would cost $8.72. I can give a cost estimate for shipping outside of the US. The components are in good condition. Here is a list of all included components.
